title: Android 13 wish list: Things we’d love to see in the next OS release [Video]
content:
Android 13 is just around the corner with the public-facing beta set to arrive in the coming weeks. We’ve already had the opportunity to test drive the Developer Preview, but that hasn’t stopped us from dreaming up an Android 13 wish list of things we’d love to see later this year.

more…

The post Android 13 wish list: Things we’d love to see in the next OS release [Video] appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: Android 12 and 12L provided a massive overhaul but it has us thinking of our own wish list ahead of the upcoming Android 13 release.
